lines.text: Beware this man, if you deal in evil. For here comes Mandrake! Mandrake the Magician! With Lothar and Princess Narda, three against evil - shielded by truth, armed with magic... Lothar, Narda and Mandrake the Magician!
This is no time for emotion. This is the time for mind over emotion!
But it's impossible. How did you manage - how dis you manage to escape? It's impossible!
Mr. Brown, a good magician never reveals his secrets.
